tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  department_id INT,
  length_of_stay INT
  FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES departments(department_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department_id INT,
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE
);
